entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:09 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 09:18 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: NNW 32 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
